startScreen.nodeConnectionTimeout:
Couldn't start an Ethereum node!
Are you already running a node? Make sure your IPC path is set to the default: $ geth --ipcpath __path__
startScreen.nodeBinaryNotFound:
No Ethereum node binary found!
Please start one manually.
startScreen.nodeSyncing: Ethereum node needs to sync, please wait...

sendTransactionConfirmation.contractExecutionInfo: You are about to execute a function on a contract. This might involve transfer of value.
sendTransactionConfirmation.contractCreationInfo: You are about to create a contract from the provided data.
sendTransactionConfirmation.enterPassword: Enter password to confirm the transaction
sendTransactionConfirmation.estimatedGasError: Data can't be executed, so it will use all provided gas.

onboarding.description: Ethereum is a decentralized platform for building apps on a blockchain: tamper-proof software that can transfer value and property and lives forever
onboarding.goToTestnetDescription: Test the technology freely in a sandboxed testnet.
onboarding.gotoMainnetDescription: You’ll need to some Ether in order to create and execute contracts. Don't worry we'll help you get some...
onboarding.doYouHaveAWalletFile: Do you have a wallet file?
onboarding.walletFileDescription: If you participated on the Ethereum Pre-sale 2014, you have received a .json file.
onboarding.protectDescription: Choose a password for your new account. Make it as strong as if it would protect your house keys!
onboarding.etherDescription: The ethereum network is based on token called “Ether”. You’ll need a small amount of it to do anything on the Ethereum network.
onboarding.loadItDescription:
If you already own Bitcoin, or any other cryptocurrency you can easily convert it to ether using shapeshift.

We recommend loading some where between 0.25 to 1 ether.
onboarding.mineItDescription: On the testnet you can mine ether yourself by choosing "Start Mining" from the "Develop" menu.
onboarding.tutorial1Description:
Here's some reading suggestions while you wait:

Make your own money Make a crypto currency with a fixed market supply, tokens representing real world assets or even a puzzle based coin

Learn this recipe
onboarding.tutorial2Description:
Create a crowdsale

Raise funds for a common goal, fully trustable without a third party.

Learn this recipe
onboarding.tutorial3Description:
Blockchain Organization

Create an autonomous organization with unbreakable rules on how money can be spent and who can take of the decisions.

Learn this recipe

errors.nodeNotStartedYet: Wait until your node is started up...
errors.importFailed: Couldn't import the file, password wrong?
